[{'company': {'id': 17192, 'name': 'Business France (Invest in France)', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQHtRA67oOPnHw/company-logo_400_400/0/1579265398962?e=1700092800&v=beta&t=2oMsVDSAeYuNkfHXYhHMvcUu1wcnHh_8lLQ_swpC304', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/business-france-invest/', 'employees': {'start': 1001, 'end': 5000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Amsterdam, North Holland, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'Business France (Invest in France)', 'description': 'Business France, as part of the French Embassy in the Netherlands, offers free and confidential services to help Dutch companies with their investments in France.
We can support companies on:
           - The creation of new sites
           - The expansion of the current infrastructures
           - Industrial or technology partnerships
           - Acquisitions or financial investments
We also provide information, advice, and contact on:

If you are interested: theo-paul.charpentier@businessfrance.fr', 'title': 'Trade & Investment Advisor (Invest in France)', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 69695160, 'name': "Solid'Île", 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQHthaMPU0vYWA/company-logo_400_400/0/1605783770165?e=1700092800&v=beta&t=UcIo8_V15sA2kWW2sspecPyMP6IK3KgRsOpzRhWihm8', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/solid-%C3%AEle/', 'employees': {'start': 2, 'end': 10}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'France', 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'company': "Solid'Île", 'description': "We built an online platform to support local retailers on a french island in Brittany. 
By facing two challenges, the current crisis and being isolated on an island, the shop owners, artisans, and local producers of Belle-Île are going through real economic difficulties. Therefore, by bringing a range of different skills, we decided to help them by accelerating the digitalisation of their businesses.

Within the organisation, I am in charge of:

    - Business Development/Operations: Reaching out to business owners. Managing entering demands and answering questions. Analysing the market and looking for opportunities.

    - Marketing/Media: Creation of content on our social media (Visuals, GIF, publications). Community management. Contacting media (newspapers, radio, TV) and organising interviews.

    - Communication: Contacting and meeting local representatives (mayors, territorial development, union of workers). Keeping subscribers updated.

    - Training: Organising webinars to assist business owners in the creation of e-shops.

    - Support: Entering and updating subscribers' data into the platform (through the back-office).", 'title': 'Co-Founder', 'employment_type': 'Self-employed'}]}, {'company': {'id': 3699647, 'name': 'Bouygues Construction Australia', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQE4rupLTz-1GA/company-logo_400_400/0/1548895681815?e=1700092800&v=beta&t=5rlqW9bDU-p_dKiQUHtahypBgQYTVPaZa2Kdvz04yZ4', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/bouygues-construction-australia/', 'employees': {'start': 501, 'end': 1000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Sydney, Australia', 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'company': 'Bouygues Construction Australia', 'description': 'The Westconnex 3A project managed by the joint venture of Bouygues Construction - Samsung - Lendlease is part of an important urban development program within the Sydney area.

Within this project, I had the opportunity to work as a site administrator and being deployed both at the headquarter but also on one of the three construction sites. Working with every department of the company we were processing every order and payment due, as well as recording and reporting these data for financial analysis. Therefore, we were on the frontline for the good functioning of the company which implied important organizational and communication skills. 

During this job, I was asked to:
- Process in the system (Oracle) every demand made by the team, which included orders, invoices, payments, supplier set-up, etc.
- Report all purchases and payment made to our manager and finance manager
- Report through recurrent meetings to our manager and the project manager about the situation and the progress made on site
- Communicate about possible process failure or weakness
- Work closely with my team to align our process
- Organize the working space and manage a huge quantity of papers.', 'title': 'Site Administrator', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 269012, 'name': 'Erasmus University Rotterdam', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQH6a-XX__UABw/company-logo_400_400/0/1564983668078?e=1700092800&v=beta&t=tM-0TKjgM6Aj5HskmYQ6XuFHJ0tS2_B_Sdt32vUOm6M', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/school/erasmus-university-rotterdam/', 'employees': {'start': 1001, 'end': 5000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Rotterdam Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'company': 'Erasmus University Rotterdam', 'description': 'Provided multiple workshops to classes of 25 IBA students for the course "Leadership, Sustainability and Governance"', 'title': 'Teaching Assistant', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Le Petit Noir', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Région de Paris, France', 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'company': 'Le Petit Noir', 'description': 'Le Petit Noir is a company created by the Walt Group.
